name: [WIP] One Step at a Time
description:
My first game, mostly just a way to practice & learn Ink as I write. Any feedback regarding grammar, spelling, flow, and coding are greatly appreciated! The quality of the writing will also be tightened up & polished as I get closer to finishing the bones (code) of the project.

Content warning for the game:

  • suicidal ideation
  • disordered eating
  • possibly others! (will update as needed)
